transcript: you making 50 or 70,000 a year it makes no difference in the Long Haul but if you learn from one of the best in the industry at anything you should be paying them and the fact that they will accept you at any price is worth it every time it would be like me going to Elon Musk and saying hey I'll be your assistant or whatever and then he offers me $100,000 a year and me being like I'll come for 200 think about how stupid that is that's the decision 20-year-olds make every day and wonder why they don't succeed longterm
